mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def create_tag_cloud(paragraph, excluded_words=[]):
    words = re.findall('', paragraph.lower())
    words = [word for word in words if word not in excluded_words]
    word_count = Counter(words)
    sorted_words = sorted(word_count.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
    return sorted_words

mutants.original_line: words = [word for word in words if word not in excluded_words]
mutants.mutated_line: words = [word for word in words if word in excluded_words]

import re
from collections import Counter

def create_tag_cloud(paragraph, excluded_words=[]):
    words = re.findall('\\w+', paragraph.lower())
    words = [word for word in words if word in excluded_words]
    word_count = Counter(words)
    sorted_words = sorted(word_count.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
    return sorted_words

    words = re.findall('\\w+', paragraph.lower())

mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def create_tag_cloud(paragraph, excluded_words=[]):
    words = re.findall('\\w+', paragraph.lower())
    words = [word for word in words if word not in excluded_words]
    word_count = Counter(words)
    sorted_words = sorted(word_count.items(), key=lambda x: x[-1], reverse=True)
    return sorted_words
